languages.text: "Я обещаю, вы не пожалеете о своем терпении, шерин".
"I promise you won't regret being patient, shereen."
languages.original_text: "Я обещаю, вы не пожалеете о своем терпении, шерин".

traits.locale_text: "I promise you won't regret being patient, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I promise you won't regret being patient, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I promise you won't regret being patient, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I promise you won't regret being patient, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Le juro que no lamentará ser paciente, shereen».
languages.original_text: "I promise you won't regret being patient, shereen."

traits.locale_text: «Le juro que no lamentará ser paciente, shereen».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我保证你不会后悔耐心等待的，亲爱的。”
languages.original_text: "I promise you won't regret being patient, shereen."

traits.locale_text: “我保证你不会后悔耐心等待的，亲爱的。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「我慢してるみたいだけど、後悔させないから安心しな、シャリーン」
languages.original_text: "I promise you won't regret being patient, shereen."

traits.locale_text: 「我慢してるみたいだけど、後悔させないから安心しな、シャリーン」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous ne regretterez pas d'avoir fait preuve de patience, shereen, je vous le promets. »
languages.original_text: "I promise you won't regret being patient, shereen."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne regretterez pas d'avoir fait preuve de patience, shereen, je vous le promets. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich verspreche, Ihr werdet Eure Geduld nicht bereuen, Shereen."
languages.original_text: "I promise you won't regret being patient, shereen."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verspreche, Ihr werdet Eure Geduld nicht bereuen, Shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "I promise you won't regret being patient, shereen."

languages.text: "Sabırlı davrandığın için pişman olmayacaksın, söz veriyorum şirinim."
languages.original_text: "I promise you won't regret being patient, shereen."

traits.locale_text: "Sabırlı davrandığın için pişman olmayacaksın, söz veriyorum şirinim."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
